website_summaries.verdict: If you dislike ear bands and want a simple, lightweight mask in a bandana or scarf style, these are for you.
pros: Scarf style easily slips on and off your face, making these ideal for when you are exercising and don't need to cover your face unless you encounter hazards (people, particles in the air)
Comes in just about every color
cons: Not medical grade (most mass-market cloth masks are not)

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The four pack of these cloth face bandanas is pretty great. The colors are nice. The fabric is soft and not itchy. They seem relatively breathable when covering nose and mouth. The only issue I had with them was they were a little snug. There wasn't a lot of stretch to mine, so getting them on to try them was a bit tricky. I did end up giving them to my teenage son, though, since he liked them and wanted them. They fit him perfectly. I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine J

customer_reviews.title: Nice, thin, roomy neck gators, good deal
customer_reviews.text: These are thin, which is nice in the summer here in the desert. They are roomy, and fit a full-sized man well. Petite women may want to fold over a time (or two) to make taunt enough to stay up over the nose if desired. The length is good, very generous. Great colors, and a really good deal to get so many in one package. I'm throwing a couple in each of my motorcycle saddlebags to have on hand for riding purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: They are very light weight, and the material is very breathable. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied and impressed with the quality of the masks. They are very light weight, and the material is very breathable. Very comfortable to wear and social distance safely. I highly reccomend this product to anyone that is looking for masks to protect themselves from covid.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!!
customer_reviews.text: These masks are great. I’ve been using ones with elastic around the ears and it was getting uncomfortable to keep that on all day. I wanted something that I could keep on and not chance losing, so I saw someone with something like this in the store and decided to order these. They are perfect! I throw it on my neck when I leave the house, and can just pull it up when I need to. Much easier than having to remember to grab it and bring in the store with me!
customer_reviews.author: gZap

customer_reviews.title: Vendor wants to “BUY” a good review!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these. I found them to be of average quality. they are kind of tight going over my head. BUT....... I received a letter from the vendor informing me that if I gave them an “Awesome” review that they would send me a “Gift Card” valued at $30.00 I cannot in all fairness give them an awesome review, when they are trying to “Buy” a good review! They seem ok, but I guess they are trying to pump up their reviews to sell more of their product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for me.
customer_reviews.text: This product is too tight for me; I am 6 foot tall and of an average build. So, it's not like I'm a person with a weight problem and the mask is simply too small for me. Other than that, I'd like to see Amazon make clear a products country of origin. Buying China is not a high priority for me right now.
customer_reviews.author: Howard L.Dean

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, breathable and quick drying
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these masks to wear when I cycle. They are perfect ( they come in a group of 4). I can ride with it below my chin and as soon as I approach anyone I pull it up. So much better than a tie mask. No struggling with the knots or being tickled by the ties.They dry quickly and can be washed and dry by morning. I gave one to my daughter-in-law. She used it for jogging and was past happy. She called to ask where I got it so I reordered the masks and had them sent directly to her, and while I was at it I ordered my self another 4.
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this for COVID
customer_reviews.text: The neck gaiter is nice. It's soft. I like the colors. My problem is that I have to wear a mask for 8 hours straight and the straps of ordinary masks hurt my ears. I need comfortable COVID protection. The problem with this product is that it is a single layer of fabric. According to an article I read this week, a single layer is zero protection. I then tested it by trying to blow out a candle. I could blow it out as if I was wearing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: John Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: light weight and very breathable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it did not go near my ears...I wear hearing aids and glasses, the masks with elastic strips to keep them on your face tend to knock one or both off when I wear them. This item is very light and breathable. To offer more protection I double it (or if in crowds I quadruple it for maximum protection). It folds over easily and does not become bulky or cumbersome. Even quadrupled it breathes easily. I wash the ones I wear each day before I go to bed at night and the next morning they are dry, fresh and ready for another day
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit & keeps its newness
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing 2 other brands on my 3rd purchase I ordered these face Bandannas to Comply with the face mask law & these are the best by far because they stay on the nose the other ones I’ve had get loose & fall off I’m constantly adjusting. But not with these bandannas there’s no adjusting once they’re on , I also like to wear them on my head when doing exercise Or out In the hot sun These absorbs the sweat & protects The hair from SUN DAMAGE!!! Wish I would of purchased these the 1st time.
customer_reviews.author: John paul

customer_reviews.title: small / tight uncomfortable not durable
customer_reviews.text: Wow are these tiny. Won’t even fit over my head. Not stretchy either. Had my wife try, and she was able to get it on but the first thing she said was “feels like it’s choking me”. I would avoid these if possible. Fabric is very thin. It’s pretty easy to breath thru. Size 17 inches by 9.5 inches approximately Stretches to about 11.5 inches
customer_reviews.author: ungalor

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than others I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I bought these due to the face covering requirements that we are facing. I work as a construction inspector so I'm outside most of the day. These are the same style that a lot of the workers recommend due to the fact that they are convenient and also protect you from the sun. I tried a couple of other brands that had designs on them, and they were OK but also more expensive. I ordered these to save a bit, and so glad I did! They are not only less expensive, they work so much better! They ars a better quality of fabric, that fits tight without feeling tight if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: jonsport

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. So the first thing I noticed is how easy to breathe in them it was. It also doesn’t fog my glasses. That’s a major plus. It’s a little snug but not to the point of being uncomfortable. I like the way it fits. Highly recommend. I have to wear one daily and these will be the ones I use from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use instead of disposable masks. The colors are versatile to match clothes. The 4-pack enables me to share with my spouse. We can leave in the vehicle until we need to go into public. I like the ability to pull up/down as necessary. It's good for mowing the lawn/fishing/quick shopping trips. I gave the "comfort" 4 stars because I don't like things wrapped around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: goodgirl2

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask, I wear hearing aids and with the masks that go over your ears I was having problems with my hearing aids coming off . These masks solved that problem, also they are great even if you don't wear hearing aids. They are very breathable and easy to wash. I will order more of them. Gave one to a friend and he loves it . Fast service great product and a very good price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron s

customer_reviews.title: It does what it claims!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these neck gaiters! I initially purchase these because I have children that will need them whenever school resumes (due to COVID-19 delays). I was searching for a product like this to ensure my unorganized child doesn’t loose his at school. I was also looking for something lightweight, breathable, offering protection from dust allergies and the ivy rays since I live in Arizona. These gaiters does it all. Both my son and I are allergic to dust-so this was extremely important. We tested them out and we were not overheated in the sun and just right indoors. I am absolutely satisfied with my purchase and I have shared my experiences with other mothers.
customer_reviews.author: 4tenacity

customer_reviews.title: Still Happy
customer_reviews.text: Our family of four is still very happy with this product. So much so that we placed a second order so we’d have more color choices and so our oldest daughter can take a 1/2 dozen with her when she goes off to college. For those who are unhappy with the fit, one end is slightly tighter than the other. My husband prefers the roomier end around his face and narrower end around his neck so it’s not too tight, while my daughters like the narrower end around their faces so the masks don’t slide off easily. They’ve held up well to washing & drying with warm water and hot heat. We would still recommend these. :)
customer_reviews.author: Radgear

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and Sturdy Gaiter Mask
customer_reviews.text: Since Coronavirus is not looking like it's getting any better in Los Angeles, CA, I was on the hunt for more comfortable and breathable face mask. I came across this pack and was impressed by its features and high reviews. I purchased it and received it rather quickly (thank you Amazon Prime!) and have been very happy ever since. I use it almost daily on my walks and my husband uses them too at his work (he works in construction) and they hold up so well. It has remain intact too after a few laundry washes. I highly recommend and might need to pick up more of these soon :)
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Best of all for people who wear hearing aids.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I decided to buy the face bandana! I wear hearing aids and putting an elastic on my ears with the aids is almost an impossible task. The number one fear is loosing the aid when I take my mask off. It's a really scary feeling. I spoke to a senior who actually was replacing his hearing aid because he lost it pulling off the elastic mask. So here's the final scoop: I'm so glad I have my face bandana. It's a big relief, it's not hot to wear and it's especially not hot around my neck --surprisingly--. The bandana is soft and silky. I am very HAPPY. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Marta L. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Gaitors
customer_reviews.text: These are not real thick, which makes it good when it is so hot outside. Ordered for my sister who wears hearing aides and glasses so the masks that go behind the ears do not work. These gaitors fit nice around her face.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Skov

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and quite versatile. They fit everyone well except for me. I have a very very large head. I have to buy the largest width eye glasses. Everyone loves them but I can’t wear one because of my excessively large head. They are made very well and are stretchy. Wish they made a larger size. I’m stuck with blue paper rubberband masks still.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to running and needing a mask
customer_reviews.text: This solved my problem of having a breathable mask while running. These are very comfortable and pass the "candle Test". You can always double up the layer if you want extra protection. Even on the hottest days they have performed way better than a mask. Looking forward to using while snow skiing as well. Stays in place and I don't have to touch my face to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: dran

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack of masks for my husband to wear at work during this COVID-19 pandemic. He loads trucks in a warehouse and spends a lot of time in the heat, going back and forth from being alone to being around people. He does say it’s a bit warm when it’s around his neck, but it’s great when he has it pulled over his mouth. He loves the ease of moving it up and down quickly and being able to breathe in it. It’s also pretty good at keeping the sweat off him face. He has facial hair so regular face masks don’t fit so great. If this goes on much longer we might be buying more! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Woodin

customer_reviews.title: Flexible/comfortable head coverage
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been enjoying using these to hold his hair back while he works on projects outside. They are lightweight & breathable. They stretch well, making it comfortable for both my smaller head, as well as his. I look forward to trying these around my neck to provide a little protection from the sun, sweat absorption, or warmth when It’s just a little chilly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Gaiters !
customer_reviews.text: These neck gaiters are made from high quality material and appear to be very durable. They are very colorful and wash well. I am very impressed with this product and quite happy that I ordered them. I wear them in place of a face mask when I go grocery shopping or do other necessary chores when around other people and they are extremely comfortable. Would highly recommend buying these neck gaiters. One last thing,,, they arrived in a very timely manner and I didn't have to wait for weeks for delivery. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Retired and Happy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the gators I didn’t know what to expect, but once they arrived I was fell in love with them. For me these gators work much better than the standard mask. (1) And most important I can breath and It doesn’t trigger my allergies. (2) When it’s around my neck it protects the back my neck from the sun. (3) Since it’s around my neck I can’t forget it in the car or at home. (4) With the four different colors I can color coordinate. I’ve compared my gators with other and I must say your gators it the better choice, better quality, better materials.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work I think my neck's a little bigger but overall they're very well-made but I had to return because my necks just a little bigger all is well good product don't want to knock it I had to keep one so I'm sorry I figured I didn't want to wash it and I do apologize for having to keep one because of the covet as well I didn't think that they want it that back I did use it I work for AutoZone so I used it but I returned the other three
customer_reviews.author: david thomas fortier

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bandanas!
customer_reviews.text: I used it all summer. It kept me cool during the summer golf rounds and saved my neck from burning from the sun. I am going to use it again for the late fall rounds or early winter rounds. It also bought some similar ones (extra bandanas) from the other Amazon seller, but they were as good as these ones. These bandanas are a little more stretchable and just a little better quality, but made a big difference in overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: HAG91

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Choice
customer_reviews.text: I really like that is fits over my head although my head is small and it slips down sometimes. I wear hearing aids that go behind the ear. The regular masks have straps that fit behind the ear which get tangled with my hearing aids. I am concerned that one of them may fall off my ear and get damaged. So these masks are so much better for me. With Winter on its way I am also glad I will have a layer of cloth around my neck. These masks are a win-wing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Zappia

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Other "Masks"!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as an alternative to traditional masks - HIGHLY important during these COVID times. They work SO much better because you can breathe very easily in them, they don't fog my glasses, you can speak clearly and be heard clearly, they rest comfortably on the neck (instead of pulling the backs of my ears), and overall highly comfortable. I would highly recommend these to folks looking for a more comfortable alternative to traditional cloth masks.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a College Age Guy
customer_reviews.text: Using as a mask alternative for a big-headed guy who can't keep a regular mask on without hurting his ears. Passed the candle blow test for masks (couldn't blow a candle out through it) Causes a bit of pressure on the nose but overall, way more comfortable than traditional masks with ear loops. Breathable in this hot summer heat. The variety of colors is nice for coordinating with your clothes if that's something you care about.
customer_reviews.author: Sundari

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT NECK GAITER
customer_reviews.text: When we were required to wear a face protection due to COVID-19, we did not want to wear a mask. Therefore, we ordered these neck gaiters. They are so convenient to use. Just slip them over your head, pull them down onto your neck and then pull them up over your mouth and nose when necessary to wear. They are stretchy enough to fit over your head nicely. The quality is excellent. We have washed them several times and they still look new. We would definitely purchase these again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Payne

customer_reviews.title: Fabric Too Heavy and Hard to Breathe
customer_reviews.text: The heavy fabric and dark colors made it hard to breathe. I could not wear the mask for a long time due to the humidity, The dark colors did not help and absorbed heat. A lighter weight fabric and lighter colors would help. I loved that the masks were washable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Way more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use ILO a mask and am VERY happy with them. They are comfortable and easy to breathe through. I leave it around my neck like a mock turtle and pull it up when necessary. It is always available. I even had one embroidered with my Church Logo for Sundays!
customer_reviews.author: Greytails

customer_reviews.title: Elastic isn't strong enough to keep the mask up
customer_reviews.text: These appear well-made and are nice colors. They are a little snug, but that alone would be OK except that the elastic in the bands on both ends, while new, is not strong, so the masks keep sliding down CONSTANTLY. Just on my way to work (I ride the bus), this mask slid down SIX times. These might be OK for a walk around the neighborhood or a quick trip to the corner store but not for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny T. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these face bandanas for my family to wear at an outdoor event and they did not disappoint. My almost 13 year old prefers these to masks. My only complaints are they are a little tight around the neck if you have a large neck. I was able to stretch mine out enough to feel like it wasn’t choking me. They are easy to breath through and hold up after washing. It is nice to be able to pull it down when needed instead of unhooking a mask from your ears. I will be purchasing more for my son to wear to school next month.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors, since we have to wear the coverings
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted some fun colors to wear, now that masks are required. Note, if you wear make up, or do your hair, it’s better to put this one first and than get ready, than you can just pull it up when needed. My husband and niece prefer wearing these also. My sister bought some after I gave her one to try also. We used them at the zoo, and it was much better than the mask over your ears all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great face covering! Tight enough to not have to worry about constantly pulling it up but the material is breathable so you dont feel like you are suffocating!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice gaiters!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and light weight and stay up well. They are a nice comfortable fabric. I think they are not as good for larger heads/people. I love it because it is smaller and does not fall down, my husband feels it is a little too small and presses on his nose a bit and that is uncomfortable after some time. He does not have a large nose, but does have a larger head than me so this affects it.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting
customer_reviews.text: The Face Bandanas were shipped to me in two days. I was surprised that they were not as light weight as the last ones i ordered from another Company, they were a little better made than the other company's. Made to last and will hold in a little heat in the winter. Don't get me wrong, they are light weight and are breathable, just not so light weight that you can see thru them holding them 2 ft. from your face. When i need more I will go to this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: way too small and not stretchy at all
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is not stretchy at all. It fits so tight I can barely pull it over my head. And, it fits so tight, it feels like it is cutting off the blood supply to my head when it is around my neck. Maybe this would work OK with small children?
customer_reviews.author: Eoff

customer_reviews.title: Decent masks
customer_reviews.text: When I got these I was slightly disappointed witb breathability. They feel ok and don't get too hot on the neck but it kinda feels like im trying to breath through a swim suit at times. Overall for the price they are ok
customer_reviews.author: The Barnes-

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get one to stay on my face
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people are giving these such a great review because they don't stay on your face. I put in on & pulled it up over my nose, only to have it fall down. Tried to pull the back up further, thinking maybe it needed to be higher to get the front to stay, nope fell down. I had to return these because they wouldn't stay up & they were worthless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Quality Neck Gaiters
customer_reviews.text: These neck gaiters were exactly what we were looking for! My husband needed something lightweight and breathable and we found these qualities in this product, in addition to being very affordable. He wears them to work daily, while coaching our children in sports, and on everyday errands and they remain a quality, comfortable item. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mama of 4

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! If you want to take it off your face, you can just side it down and it provides your neck with protection from the sun. If you are wearing it over your face, it is light and breathable and actually stays put over your nose. It's really nice that it doesn't fall down your face easily. I've really liked using these especially during a time where masks are required wherever I go!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: good for summer
customer_reviews.text: Works well - a little strain on neck when wearing over nose. Little difficult to get 2 layers over mouth/nose if trying to use as a "mask". Still it is by far the easiest way to bring a face cover when riding a bike - easy to take on and off and comfortable to wear when not is use. Not very warm, so good to use during the summer fall season
customer_reviews.author: COE

customer_reviews.title: Good “mask”
customer_reviews.text: Meets the requirements of a “mask” pretty much anywhere nowadays, other than where masks are actually medically necessary. Much better than wearing a regular mask wrapped around the back of your ears, and I think more breathable. Wish it wasn’t so tight though as only one size available, peoples heads come in different sizes so it would be nice to have a size option.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was high quality and worked perfectly. Covers my face when I need it but it never makes me feel hot. Extremely breathable. It's so breathable I can even ride my bike with it on and I don't get overheated. It wicks away the sweat on my neck. Easy to put on and comfortable to wear. I highly recommend these face coverings! I loved them so much I bought them a second time!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are just what we were looking for! They are so much easier to wear than the masks with the string around the ears. I bought one for me, my 2 sons and me husband and my kids took 2 each. They are both currently front lines and say these are comfortable and very easy to wear. They will be great in the cold weather coming!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and breathable!
customer_reviews.text: These are great to wear as face masks. The variety of colors go with everything and you can simply pull them over your mouth and nose when the need arises. I work at the front desk at a hair salon and it’s so easy to pull it down when I answer the phone and pull it up when a client comes in. They are very comfortable and it’s easy to breathe. I am a small person so they are a little big but a safety pin to tighten them up works great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Preston

customer_reviews.title: Just a sewn-together tube of fabric
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on these has large weave so there are big holes in it. Each end is exactly the same circumference so it is just like a tube you put over your head and onto your neck. I suppose there are worse out there, possibly, but I expected the fabric to be a tighter knit to trap smaller particles. I'll be returning them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Kiss

customer_reviews.title: Using while on the job driving a parts delivery truck
customer_reviews.text: These Gaiters are perfect to use on the job. Easy to pull up and down, when down around neck you forget you have them on. Most important to me is being able to breathe in hot weather. No problem with these masks. Also easy to make yourself understood thru. I would and will but again so I can wash every couple of days. Since it is August, I don't know about warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Decent mask alternative.
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a mask alternative when not in dense crowds. Seems to fit nicely and stay up. The material is thin, so not appropriate for more than general outdoor use or sparse crowds. Colors are vibrant, washes well. Thin, so no real warmth. Made in China, which is not ideal but there are currently few other options.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pick

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for breathable material
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way the material feels. It’s not stuffy and I can definitely breath through it . The material can stretch so it doesn’t feel tight but it’s not loose fitting either. I got these for my husband because he didn’t like the mask as much. I like them too because my ears were starting to hurt from the string on the regular mask. They are long but I ended up cutting it in half and making two. You don’t have to do that but I didn’t want it so long . It didn’t mess them up at all and so overall not bad for the price and for how many you get , definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use it for a face mask
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could use it as a face mask, but it really didn’t work well for that. It felt like it was sliding down my face and it was too tight around my nose and mouth. I think it would be good to wear up North in zero degree weather to protect against the wind and cold. On the positive side the colors are vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandsons. They wanted these to wear instead of the medical type face masks people are wearing because of COVID-19. They said the are very comfortable and are easy to use since you just pull it up or pull it down once it’s around your neck. It’s also nice cause you can wash and reuse these.
customer_reviews.author: Pam L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly breathable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this in late July, from a mid-atlantic state, so WARMTH is NOT something I'm looking for. I own gators from 4 different manufacturers, and along with Mission, these are the best! They hold their shape after washing (skip the dryer), they're lightweight, and very comfortable. They pass the candle-blow test (cannot blow out a candle through it), and there's just enough elastic to keep it in place. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Hollander

customer_reviews.title: The Best Protection Face Bandana Neck Gaiter for cycling great adventures.
customer_reviews.text: What I like most is the breathability when I'm riding my bike. An added bonus is when I'm riding fast the material allows for the cooling around my neck due to sweating (awesome). Much better than my other neck gaiters and mask. A very comfortable addition to my cycling/walking exercise routines Summer, Winter.
customer_reviews.author: Big Sarge

customer_reviews.title: We love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter work's with horse's. The stables do lessons for special needs children and adults. It's been hot but they still have to protect them during covid-19. These have been perfect for her. They are not as hot for her and are breathable. They also keep the heat from the back of her neck While helping the students. They have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ward

customer_reviews.title: Face and Sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who sunburns easily and hates sunscreen! He has been working outdoor camps. This has provided face protection and also protected his neck from the sun. He really loves these because he can pull up over face with ease when around others and down when alone. Colors are good and 4 pack allow a clean one each day.
customer_reviews.author: wigs

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Face Bandana
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these face bandannas with the hope that they would be useful for me and my two children in high school. i have been pleasantly surprised by the fact that both my son and my daughter wear these face bandannas at practices for high school sports but also to the beach, and to the store when they go out. They are very comfortable and can move up and down quickly while coming off fast as they head for the ocean. The material is strong yet allows for comfortable breathing. Some of the other products we have tried make us feel like we are slowly suffocating. This was a solid investment during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Ear Looped Mask
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable and stays on my face while doing my daily activity. it doesn't make my face sweaty and does not fog up eye glasses while wearing it. I love the double layers of breathable fabric. It's very easy to slip on and off my face as a mask and it's also very versatile. I love the flexibility and stretch. It's so much better than war looped mask.
customer_reviews.author: Jorrell

customer_reviews.title: need a breathable mask?  Check these out!
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble breathing through the disposable masks as well as the cotton fabric masks I was using. I stumbled across these and I decided to give them a try. I was impressed with them. I was actually able to wear them for an extended period of time and I could breathe!!! I am planning to purchase more of these and I think if you are looking for a mask that you can wear and breathe through without trouble you should check these out.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great quality -easy to breath
customer_reviews.text: These masks are great, they are lightweight and breathable, easy to get kids n and off and don’t get lost like the ones that go around your ears. My husband uses them every day and we would definitely buy more, I took off one star because they did not stay up on my face so for us they aren’t unisex.
customer_reviews.author: jlynn1986

customer_reviews.title: i love this product
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this because i have a cochlear implant device and i have great trouble with most face masks because of how they fit .with this i just slide it on and it does not mess with my device or cause me discomfort. i have recommended this to my doctor for his other patients who have the same trouble as i did
customer_reviews.author: Lula M.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight breathable neck/face mask, very happy client.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing light weight versatile bandana/neck gaitors that my husband and I use often now, especially with the covid face mask restrictions. Your face doesn’t get as warm like a regular cloth mask will do due to the meshy breathable fabric that is fitted to the face and neck regions. The material is very light weight too. 😁😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to surgical-style masks for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I am required to wear a face covering while at work, but only while outside of my office. Traditional face coverings required two hands to take on and off, but I am almost always carrying papers or coffee, so never had two hands free. These neck gaiters can stay around my neck all day, making it easy to just pull it up over my nose/mouth when needed WITH ONE HAND. Also, as a glasses wearer, straps on traditional face masks were constantly getting caught on the stems of my glasses. No longer a problem with these gaiters. My son almost immediately stole one from me, because he prefers them too! Items are of good quality and are as described.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym and softball
customer_reviews.text: I bought these face covering because my gym had made the rule where you need to ware a mask to enter, I had the ones that went around your ear and I found them very uncomfortable to ware with my Airpods. I found these and when I got them I started wearing them to the gym and when I play softball. I would highly recommend that you get these, I can breathe while in the gym and pull this down very easily to drink water then move them back up and not have to fight to make this feel right
customer_reviews.author: chris Hilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I was having a difficult time breathing and working out in the cotton masks I had, so thought I'd try these based on other reviews about it being lightweight and breathable. For the past month, I've been wearing these every time I go to the gym and now my workouts are more enjoyable. I can even do heavy cardio in them without feeling like I'm going to pass out. The one downside is that these gaiters are a little too big for me and slip down, but I just use a safety pin to pull it a little tighter. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Save you from the sun!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought these for me and they have been an essential part of staying cool during my day. I deliver packages for amazon in ARIZONA!! temps were at 116 this week and with given face mask guidances, this face bandana not only keeps me and others around me safe and protected, it keeps my body temperature down in extreme weather and skin protected from the harsh UV rays. I give this product a 10/10 for its comfortability, versatility (can be worn many ways), and it’s success at keeping me cool while performing my job at an optimum pace in the summer. I look forward to making future purchases from this reputable seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, if a little snug.
customer_reviews.text: These face coverings are very comfortable, but they are snug around your face, and when you first unpackage them they will no doubt be way too tight around your neck (even for a child). Fortunately the material is very elastic and you can stretch them out after you wash. Much better fit afterwards! So, don’t panic if you try it on at first. Just wash, stretch out, and enjoy the comfort of not having to pull strings around yours ears with other masks.
customer_reviews.author: James Ashbery

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and breathable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a face cover that was easier to breathe with while offering protection when out in public. I was drawn to the attractive colors in my order and gave them a try. They are easy to use although I have to double the fabric up to make it stay in place. They wash up easily.
customer_reviews.author: V. Manderfield

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - easy to wear!
customer_reviews.text: These masks are very comfortable to wear and allow for easier breathing than regular surgical type masks. I like the idea of wearing the mask around the neck which allows for easier ability to wear it by simply pulling it up when entering a store or being in close quarters with others. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stantheman

customer_reviews.title: Not a suitable replacement for anaffective face mask
customer_reviews.text: These would be very comfortable: they are lightweight, stretchy, and versatile. However I was hoping to be able to use these with out modification as face masks. With what we now know in regards to making our own cloth face masks: thickness, fabric type, and fitting I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Marichelle

customer_reviews.title: Light, breathable, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is light, stretchy, and breathable. Great as a face covering while exercising outdoors and even better when hiking on dusty trails as it can help filter out larger dust particles. Used this on a 3 day hike at Sequoia National Park with 80 degree temps and encountered no problems with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Life is fun

customer_reviews.title: breathable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to use then traditional masks. one of my issues with masks was i was always forgetting them. misplacing them. and they pulled on my ears. this you can leave on and just pull down. its nice and light . would recommend for adult use only though. ideal for men. as they are larger
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use for protecting myself and others from transmitting things during this pandemic. They stretch easily over the head and stay in place well. They are also pretty soft on the face. Since these are full-length neck gators type masks, they excel in cold weather conditions, so can get a bit sweaty during super hot days, but they're not too bad for short excursions, and running errands around town. I think they also look alot more stylish than the medical or industrial type masks!
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable mask
customer_reviews.text: Best mask for working in during this covid stuff. It breathes well. Lightweight. I'm betting is warm but I cut it in half to let better airflow. Cut in half it goes from the top of my nose to an inch under my skin. Keeps you cool if you soak it in ice water first.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Demetriou

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a family trip where I knew we would have to wear our masks the majority of the time. I have to say, myself and my kids LOVED these! Not only are they breathable but we could easily keep track of them on our neck when not in use. I’ll definitely be buying more for the upcoming school year!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of this face bandana. I can leave it around my neck and easily pull it up over my face when I need to. The material is very breathable. I wear glasses, and I don't find my glasses fogging up like they do when I wear traditional face masks, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Best mask you could have.
customer_reviews.text: I can't get over how great these are and very versatile. I love them an appreciate you manufacturing them. I love them and can't recommend them more strongly. Once this pandemic is over you have a great looking head band along with something to hold your hair back.
customer_reviews.author: Thena Lene

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment pack
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped that these would fit me as well as my husband but I find they slide down pretty fast on me so either have to take them in to fit or give them all to him because he can wear them easily. He likes them for everywhere. Just be cautious about sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Packer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and I think they will last well.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these.I use them for the UV protection and to keep from breathing the dust and and pollen when I am mowing and doing lawn work. They are very easy to clean I just hand wash and they are dry in minutes.I would highly recommend them.I did not rate them for warmth because I live in Florida and that's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my kids, these are easier for them to manipulate than the ear loop style. Just pull them up when needed and wear around the neck when not needed. They can put one on and keep it all day. They are easy to breathe through and don’t fog up glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ivanoff

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I thought to get this as a cover face for the current situation. We do like it and it's easy to use. I have long hair so usually I use it with ponny tail as it is more comfortable. It's soft and the colors are good. I place them on the washer but I don't put the on the dryerz so I let them dry somewhere else and it dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: Dennisse Allocco

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old son loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My son has had lots of frustration with masks so I got him these to try. He says they're so much more comfortable than any others and he can breathe in them. No more panic attacks. My husband and his brother both took one so I need to order some more. These are a big hit with all the men in my family.
customer_reviews.author: KMullins

customer_reviews.title: Unisex Sun UV Protection Face Bandana Neck Gaiter, Reusable Washable Cloth Tube Scarf
customer_reviews.text: We found the product easy to use in repeated circumstances, i.e., multiple stops at different locations (stores, restaurants, office visits) without the constant need to remember a mask. In cold weather months it also doubles as a scarf when out for a stroll or walking to and from outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Suspend1

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We have a statewide order requiring face coverings in businesses. I wanted to find something that would work well for me considering I am really claustrophobic. These are great face coverings. They don't restrict your breathing the way that medical masks do. I don't have to keep adjusting my mustache and beard and don't have air blowing up into my eyeballs the entire time. I usually keep them around my neck when not in use and have found that they keep my neck and throat from getting sweaty. I would recommend these to anyone who has an issue with traditional medical masks.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Maygra

customer_reviews.title: awesome masks
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted to try these because he has hearing aides. The other mask were difficult for him to put on and off without displacement of his hearing aides. These are great. He is very happy with them. Also nice and light weight for easy breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Aksamit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family of 4!
customer_reviews.text: Since we had to acquire face coverings for our family, I was really pleased to come across this set. It had a variety of colors, as to please each person, both male and female. Item is well made, washable, and fits well - from ages 13-43! I would recommend both this product and seller to anyone looking for quality face coverings!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Useful Masks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I like being able to leave one around my neck to slip on as a mask when going into a store or whatever. I know they’ll be lovely and warm in the winter because they also add to the warmth of our hot summers, but it’s worth it for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Not too tight
customer_reviews.text: Some other gators are really tight and make it hard to breath, these don't. They are pretty comfortable and breathable. Have washed them several times and they seem to be holding together. A few strings coming out but that's typical of any cloth sewed together. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: George Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Best mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 of them , they are very breathable. The whole family uses them from 2 years old to 80 years old. They are half the price compared to the ones at the store. They are also washable they do not get damaged in the washing machine or dryer.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband whose cannot wear turtlenecks. He said that they were very comfortable! He said they were very easy to use and always with you, so no trips back to the car and no fumbling to get one behind the ears. He said they were well made and thanks for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L - Lex Ky

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable overall.  Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Its lightweight, barely noticeable but it holds in heat. If you use it in a sedentary environment it's great. But if you're working hard and sweating it doesn't help. Otherwise great product. Overall to me it's better than carrying face masks around.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Mask for Disabled Adults !!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Face Bandannas !! They are very comfortable and lightweight feeling , my brother is disabled and has a difficult time wearing a mask during this Covid pandemic, he wears these with no problems, they do not slide down on him , yet the are comfortable and keep him safe !! Great Mask, and service
customer_reviews.author: Karla S

customer_reviews.title: Wow Great neck gaiters!
customer_reviews.text: Since wearing masks everywhere became mandatory, we have been looking for something comfortable, portable, and sun-protecting gaiters. When we got these ones, everyone in our family chose a color of our own taste since this product came with even 8 gaiters with assorted colors. We love these. They are so soft and light and we can carry the gaiter around our neck and whenever we need to wear a mask, we can just pull it up to cover our face. I don't have to worry if I forget to bring my mask!! We laundered them in the washing machine and they are clean again just like new! We strongly recommend these neck gaiters!
customer_reviews.author: Jang Won Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and handy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this mask for about a week, and I find it very breathable and very easy to wear, since it hangs around the neck and all I have to do is pull it up when I am in public. I also like it for its cooling effect when wet. When I am working in my shop or in the yard in 97 degree heat, the scarf keeps me relatively comfortable. I would not only buy this product again, I plan too.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Great masks, amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and a thick neck. I was hesitant at buying these for my motorcycle adventures. But after trying them out I was extremely pleased with the quality and feel of this product. Great colors! Nice and cooling in heat, warm in cold air.
customer_reviews.author: Yury Sakovich

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical with the great price but once these arrived I was very impressed! Bought these for the family, husband and child. The material is light and breathable so you don’t feel Claustrophobic. They stay in place pretty well. I’ve had others that didn’t fit well so they’d just fall off. My daughter loves it and wears it to school everyday. Easy to wash and dry. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Saine Hunley

product_meta.title: Unisex Sun UV Protection Face Bandana Neck Gaiter, Reusable Washable Cloth Half Mask Scarf Motorcycle Balaclava for Men Women
product_meta.description:
Main Features:

◆◆High Elasticity: Stretchy fabric, it can be adjusted to fit various face shapes, and head sizes, suitable for both adults & kids. 

◆◆Premium Material: Made of super durable and skin-friendly fabric, it is lightweight and soft, do not irritate the skin.

◆◆Sweat-absorbent&Quick Dry: Breathable fabric, it transfers heat and humidity away from your body, increasing comfort in use and keeping you cool.

◆◆Best Protection for You: Protect your neck and face at the same time, a UV sun-proof, dust-proof, sand-proof, windproof product!

◆◆Multiple Wearing Way: Wear it as a headwear, face scarf, balaclava, neck gaiter, sweatband, wrist band, or scarf bandana, etc.

◆◆Good for Various Occasion: Perfect for various sports and outdoor activities: running, hiking, walking, cycling, fishing, hunting, etc.



Washing Advice: 

Hand wash recommended, use cold water, do not bleach, hang or line dry.
feature_bullets: ☀☀LIGHTWEIGHT, SOFT, THIN, AND BREATHABLE☀☀: Our face bandana is the moisture-wicking and quick-dry fabric that keeps you cool. Each cloth bandana mask is one solid piece that improves comfort, flexibility, and long-lasting durability so it doesn’t lose shape. It is reusable and washable. It is not only lightweight and soft, but also breathable and sweat-absorbent.

☀☀PROTECT FROM UV SUN DUST WIND☀☀: The moisture wicking fabric transfers heat and humidity away from your body and outside of the seamless bandana, make you feel comfortable. It keeps you cool in the summer and warm in winter. And it can help protect your neck, mouth and face at the same from harmful UV and guard you against wind, dust and sand.

☀☀HIGH ELASTICITY, ONE SIZE FOR MOST☀☀: The neck gaiter is made of super durable and skin-friendly fabric. Designed with super stretchy fabric, which can be adjusted to fit various face shapes, accommodates most head sizes, and suitable for both adults & kids. Elastic tensile fiber keeps the neck mask in place and not slide.

☀☀FASHION INFINITY FACE SCARF BANDANAS☀☀: The versatile face bandana has a wide variety of wearing ways. Use it as a neck warmer, headband, mask scarf, combi buff, hair-band, balaclava, face bandana, ear warmer, head cover, pirate hat, neckerchief, beanie cap, hood, and wristband. You can wear by your own style according to your need.

☀☀NECK GAITER MASK FOR MULTIPLE ACTIVITIES☀☀: Perfect for various outdoor sports and activities: Music Festivals, Concerts, Biking, Raves, Paintball, Hiking, Yoga, Exercising, Yard Work, Riding, Fishing, Cycling, Motorcycle, Motocross, ATV Bike, Running, Hunting, Climbing, Camping, Tactical, Skiing, Snowboarding. Give your face best protection.
